fullDescription.intro: This layer applies global average pooling in two dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Global Average Pooling 2D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Global Average Pooling 2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Global Average Pooling 2D layer.
